SERVICES
Let us build your company's image
Vantage Media offers many services that your company can greatly benefit from. You name it, we do it. From basic mark-up/layouts to Full-Stack websites with SEO and marketing. If you need it, you can have it.
Design
Design is what locks in your audiance. Catching your clients eye sets the pace for how you run your business.

In web development design is everything. Functionality is expected, but design.....design shows what your site represents. From how your animations look to the choice of images you have. It sets the pace for your users mind to follow throughout their entire experience with your company. From a sleek and modern feel to a warm and rustic feel Vantage Media has you covered. Your site is a blank canvas waiting to be discovered.
Marketing
Marketing - how you get your companies brand out there. Bringing your company more business.

Marketing is one of the pillars of all businesses. How can anyone purchase your services if they don't know you even exist? We have the knowledge to take care of all of your companies marketing needs. SEO, Ad-Words, Facebook, Instagram etc. are all ways to get your companies name out there and Vantage Media knows the techniques to do it.
Tailored service
Having your own custom code removes the handcuffs that templated sites restrain you with.

Having a custom code tailored to your website will put your business a step above the rest. When you use a templated site it comes with the restraints of what that sites services provide to you. Custom code allows you to do whatever you want however you want. It also alows you to put our own SEO code into the site to bring your business to the top of search enginges faster than a standard prebuilt sites templates. Would you rather have a stock honda civic for a car, or a Lamborghini Aventador?
Marketing
Marketing - how you get your companies brand out there. Bringing your company more business.

We have an entire tool belt of tools to customize your business at our disposal. From basic HTML5/CSS3 pages to full blown MongoDB, Node.js, and Express pages. If there is a feature, module, or animation you want for your site we can find it. Custom looks combined with the bleeding edge of todays technology allow us to provide your users with a fully immersive and unique experience. Your site. Your way.
